thread.title_full: The Pearl Source reviewed by C..

author: C..
title: C..
text: To be honest I was very apprehensive...I choked SF jewelery market ..Macy's...OVERSTK.. AMAZON..ECT ECT TPS KEPT COMING UP WITH BEST PRICES....SO AWAY I WENT WITH MY ORDER...IM SO HAPPY I DID VERY IMPRESSED WITH ALL THREE PIECES...WILL USE THIS CO FOREVER...THIS ONE YOU CAN TRUST..THEY WERE ALSO VERY NICE WHEN I CALLED WITH QUESTION'S...I WILL LOVE THESE PEARLS THE REST OF MY DAYS...THANK YOU PEARK SOURCE...YOUR GREATðŸ™‚
